Summary: I went outside and someone or something was flashing Me in trees red orange globe
divs: sighting detailsit was so close only about 20 foot away it is a pulsating light small orange but red \ orange round orb light anyway i went outside for smokes and then seen somehow these flashes they are red\orange very bright and this is not a prank i had a chance to look see it clearly and say ahah dont fck with me and was able to walk back in no problem lock door and i know i wont be sleeping tonight at all.
